thread.title: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Invites Travelers To Celebrate Fall With New Travel Deals To More Than 35 Destinations
thread.title_full: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Invites Travelers To Celebrate Fall With New Travel Deals To More Than 35 Destinations

title: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Invites Travelers To Celebrate Fall With New Travel Deals To More Than 35 Destinations
text:
Wyndham® Extra Holidays Invites Travelers To Celebrate Fall With New Travel Deals To More Than 35 Destinations By PR Newswire | 09/01/15 - 02:32 PM EDT Reprint ORLANDO, Fla. , Sept. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Wyndham® Extra Holidays , a subsidiary of Wyndham Vacation Ownership (WVO), the world's largest vacation ownership company and member of the Wyndham Worldwide family of companies (NYSE: WYN), is now offering special travel deals to more than 35 destinations this fall during the Wyndham ® Extra Holidays "Nothing Quite Feels Like Fall" Sale available at www.ExtraHolidays.com/Fall . Discover your perfect fall getaway at a resort offered by Wyndham® Extra Holidays . Travelers can stay in spacious condo-style suites most complete with all the comforts of home: fully equipped kitchens, expansive private bedrooms, as well as separate dining and living areas. Take advantage of special deals of up to 30 percent off at popular fall destinations across the U.S. including the resorts featured below. Carefree Getaways : Raise a glass to fall freedom as you enjoy wine tastings, sightseeing and other urbane adventures from Vegas to Atlantic City . Enjoy specials on getaways at some of the country's most popular resort destinations such as: Las Vegas, Nevada - Desert Rose Resort Once the summer heat has passed, Fall is a great time of year to visit Las Vegas . Located 1.5 blocks from the Las Vegas Strip, this resort is a relaxing and refreshing hideaway, featuring a sparkling pool surrounded by dense tropical plants. Cool Fairways : The weather is just right for a day on the greens. When you're not keeping your eye on the ball, take in the amazing seasonal scenery all around you at golf resort destinations from coast to coast including: Fairfield Glade, Tennessee - Wyndham Resort at Fairfield Glade Choose from five golf courses aglow in fall colors and explore the vast array of on-site amenities, including 11 lakes, two beaches, two marinas, 14 tennis courts, horseback riding, game room, fitness center and three swimming pools. Crisp Mountain Air : Comfortable temps and changing leaves are your invitation to hike or bike New England, the Colorado Rockies and other fall favorites. So grab a sweater and your camera and get going to beautiful resort destinations where you can enjoy the great outdoors, such as: Sevierville, Tennessee - Wyndham Smoky Mountains Beautiful fall leaves will surround you at Wyndham Smoky Mountains, and you're less than 13 miles from America's number one national park destination. Plenty of on-site resort activities include yoga, crafts, movie nights and wine and cheese socials. Calm Beaches : While everyone else is going back to school, spread out on the gorgeous beaches they've left waiting for you. From Florida to Hawaii , there's a warm and sunny shore with your name on it. Enjoy beautiful beach destinations such as: Princeville, Hawaii (Kaua'i) - Wyndham Bali Hai Villas This peaceful Princeville resort is near an abundance of restaurants, beaches, galleries, boutiques and challenging golf courses. After exploring everything the island has to offer, retreat to your family suite's lanai, relax by one of the two pools or play a game of tennis. Spacious suites create a warm Hawaiian atmosphere where you can relax in style. Book now at www.ExtraHolidays.com/Fall or call 800-670-3620 and mention code FALL15. Book by September 30, 2015 . Travel by November 24, 2015 . Two-night minimum stay required. Reservations subject to availability. Reservations not valid over holidays and special events. Cannot be combined with any other offer. All monetary amounts are noted in U.S. Dollars unless otherwise noted. Fla. Seller of Travel Reg. No. ST-35519. About Wyndham ® Extra Holidays Wyndham® Extra Holidays specializes in offering quality vacation accommodations throughout the United States , including Hawaii , the U.S. Virgin Islands , Canada , Mexico , Fiji and Puerto Rico . Wyndham ® Extra Holidays is a specialized provider of rental vacation accommodations and a part of Wyndham Vacation Ownership, which is headquartered in Orlando, Fla. A subsidiary of Wyndham Worldwide , Wyndham Vacation Ownership is the world's largest vacation ownership business, as measured by the number of vacation ownership resorts, individual vacation ownership units and owners of vacation ownership interests.
